Package sharedRegions

Class Repository

java.lang.Object
sharedRegions.Repository
public class Repository
extends java.lang.Object
Implementation of the Repository Shared Memory. Responsible for logging all changes during the program run.

    • setQIn

      public void setQIn​(int num, java.lang.String q)
      Set occupation state for the waiting queue (passenger id / - (empty)).
      Parameters:
      num - position of the queue to add one passenger.
      q - passenger to put in the queue position.

    • setQOut

      public void setQOut()
      Remove first element from the waiting queue and add '-' (empty) to the last position.

    • setS

      public void setS​(int num, java.lang.String s)
      Set occupation state for seat in the bus (passenger id / - (empty)).
      Parameters:
      num - seat position to put the passenger.
      s - passenger to put in the seat position.

    • setST

    • setSI

      public void setSI​(int num, java.lang.String si)
      Set situation of passenger # (# - 0 .. 5) â€“ TRT (in transit) / FDT (has this airport as her final destination). Count total number of passengers in transit and with this airport as final destination (all flights).
      Parameters:
      num - passenger to set situation.
      si - situation of the passenger.

    • setNR

      public void setNR​(int num, int nr)
      Set number of pieces of luggage the passenger # (# - 0 .. 5) carried at the start of her journey. Count total number of pieces of luggage (all flights).
      Parameters:
      num - passenger that carried the pieces of luggage at the start of her journey.
      nr - number of pieces of luggage the passenger carried at the start of her journey.

    • setNA

      public void setNA​(int num, int na)
      Set number of pieces of luggage the passenger # (# - 0 .. 5) he has presently collected.
      Parameters:
      num - passenger that has presently collected the pieces of luggage.
      na - number of pieces of luggage that the passenger has presently collected.

    • reset_Passenger

      public void reset_Passenger​(int num)
      Count number of pieces of luggage that the passenger has presently collected (all passengers in all flight). Reset passenger to the initial state.
      Parameters:
      num - passenger to be put in the initial state.
